alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay and central Duval Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arlington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Ortega, Craig Field, San Pablo, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline and Cecil Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
